bioconda.name: igv
bioconda.summary:
Integrative Genomics Viewer. Fast, efficient, scalable visualization tool for genomics
data and annotations.

biocontainers.name: igv
biocontainers.summary: High-performance visualization tool for interactive exploration of large, integrated datasets. it supports a wide variety of data types and format, including short-read alignments in the sam/bam format. data can be viewed from local files or over the web via http.

biotools.summary: High-performance visualization tool for interactive exploration of large, integrated datasets. It supports a wide variety of data types and format, including short-read alignments in the SAM/BAM format. Data can be viewed from local files or over the web via http.

bioschemas.name: IGV
bioschemas.summary: High-performance visualization tool for interactive exploration of large, integrated datasets. It supports a wide variety of data types and format, including short-read alignments in the SAM/BAM format. Data can be viewed from local files or over the web via http.
